message.body: Oh no! Is she okay? - please let me know if you need anything
I will def give you a report back
Hey! I can't make it tonight my mom went in to the hospital and I'm debating going up to Vermont tonight:( take notes for me
I'm just getting out of class to messages from my sister. Something with an infection from a tooth.
That makes sense! If you go tonight - travel safe - lll check in with you tomorrow and see how your doing
Thanks. I'll feel better once I talk to someone
Hey! My mom is good. She had an emergency root canal last night from an abscessed tooth. She can't talk but is ok! Hope the reading was great!
I was really good. I saw that they recorded it and I think it would be really worth watching. So glad you mom is okay. Emergency root canal sounds awful! Did you drive up?
I stayed. She said "wait til she breaks a hip" to come up. Ha. I'll check the site for the recording! Did you go to dinner?
I did! I got to hear some good stories - I will tell you all about it. I think her talk has some really good storytelling advice
I got excited about the possibility of you sending her your script for feedback - she seems super approachable
So awesome. I can't wait to talk to you about it
